channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ameena
item.dc:creator: Ameena
item.content:encoded:
I agree with skreebydba​ (Frank).
Jes, this is an excellent idea. Sometimes people don’t know themselves that they have hidden talent of explaining complex concepts and this will bring it out.

Ameena

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Dear Mike, have you ever tried saying No to Jes?
item.content:encoded: Dear Mike, have you ever tried saying No to Jes?

item.title: By: Frank Gill
item.dc:creator: Frank Gill
item.content:encoded:
Jes,

That is great. I think I know what I will be adding to the next CSSUG invitation.

item.title: By: Mike Fal
item.dc:creator: Mike Fal
item.description: I love this idea. We did a similar thing in Denver last month, but it was a struggle. I'm curious as to how much you emailed/pimped it. I didn't email about it, but I had been talking about it for 3 months. We only got two speakers, but they both did well. I'm shooting again for another attempt in a couple of months and I'm hoping that the success from the first round will get others willing to step up.
item.content:encoded: I love this idea. We did a similar thing in Denver last month, but it was a struggle. I’m curious as to how much you emailed/pimped it. I didn’t email about it, but I had been talking about it for 3 months. We only got two speakers, but they both did well. I’m shooting again for another attempt in a couple of months and I’m hoping that the success from the first round will get others willing to step up.
